about_the_game:
The villain erased part of your memory and broke these memories into fragments by locking them in an energy tower . Your task is to properly connect the energy to restore your memories. This is a strategy game that develops logic and attentiveness , as well as a good time killer .
Rules of the game:
You will need to build bridges between energy sources and gates that hide girls avoiding places with bombs that destroy previously built bridges
In the game:
Cute art
Gallery with pictures
Good music
Dynamic atmosphere
Progress
Leaders

content_descriptors.notes: THE GAME HAS SEX SCENES AND NUDE BODY PARTS

detailed_description:
The villain erased part of your memory and broke these memories into fragments by locking them in an energy tower . Your task is to properly connect the energy to restore your memories. This is a strategy game that develops logic and attentiveness , as well as a good time killer .
Rules of the game:
You will need to build bridges between energy sources and gates that hide girls avoiding places with bombs that destroy previously built bridges

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: Intel Celeron 2.6 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 compatible

short_description: The legendary game "Tetris" in a unique performance and atmosphere
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean, Russian, Turkish, Japanese, Simplified Chinese
